00032 ConfigurationFileHandler::ConfigurationFileHandler(const std::string filename) {
00033         this->filename = filename;
00034 
00035 #ifdef BRICS_XERCES_ENABLE
00036         LOG(INFO) << "Opening configuration file " << filename;
00037 
00038         // Initialize the XML4C2 system.
00039         try {
00040                 XMLPlatformUtils::Initialize();
00041         }
00042 
00043         catch (const XMLException& e) {
00044                 char *pMsg = XMLString::transcode(e.getMessage());
00045                 cerr << "ERROR: An error occured during Xerces initialization.\n"
00046                                 << "  Exception message:"
00047                                 << pMsg;
00048                 XMLString::release(&pMsg);
00049                 return;
00050         }
00051 
00052 //      const XMLCh* gEncodingName = 0;
00053 //      const XMLFormatter* gFormatter = 0;
00054 
00055         //
00056         //  Create our parser, then attach an error handler to the parser.
00057         //  The parser will call back to methods of the ErrorHandler if it
00058         //  discovers errors during the course of parsing the XML document.
00059         //
00060         parser = new XercesDOMParser;
00061         parser->setValidationScheme(XercesDOMParser::Val_Auto);
00062         parser->setDoNamespaces(false);
00063         parser->setDoSchema(false);
00064         parser->setValidationSchemaFullChecking(false);
00065         parser->setCreateEntityReferenceNodes(false);
00066 
00067         //
00068         //  Parse the XML file, catching any XML exceptions that might propagate
00069         //  out of it.
00070         //
00071         errorsOccured = false;
00072         try {
00073                 parser->parse(filename.c_str());
00074                 int errorCount = parser->getErrorCount();
00075                 if (errorCount > 0) {
00076                         errorsOccured = true;
00077                         LOG(ERROR) << "XML document has " << errorsOccured << " error(s).";
00078                 }
00079 
00080         } catch (const XMLException& e) {
00081                 LOG(ERROR) << "An error occured during parsing\n   Message: " << e.getMessage();
00082                 errorsOccured = true;
00083         } catch (const DOMException& e) {
00084                 LOG(ERROR) << "A DOM error occured during parsing\n   DOMException code: " << e.code;
00085                 errorsOccured = true;
00086         } catch (...) {
00087                 LOG(ERROR) << "An error occured during parsing\n" << endl;
00088                 errorsOccured = true;
00089         }
00090 
00091 #else
00092         LOG(WARNING) <<  "Xerces is not enabled. No XML I/O support.";
00093         errorsOccured = true;
00094 #endif
00095 
00096 }
00097 
00098 ConfigurationFileHandler::~ConfigurationFileHandler() {
00099 #ifdef BRICS_XERCES_ENABLE
00100         delete parser;
00101         XMLPlatformUtils::Terminate();
00102 #endif BRICS_XERCES_ENABLE
00103 }
00104 
00105 bool ConfigurationFileHandler::getAttribute(std::string algorithm, std::string attribute, std::string* result) {
00106 #ifdef BRICS_XERCES_ENABLE
00107         if (errorsOccured) {
00108                 return false;
00109         }
00110 
00111     DOMNode* current = NULL;
00112     DOMNode* attributeNode = NULL;
00113     XMLCh* algorithmName = XMLString::transcode(algorithm.c_str());
00114     XMLCh* attributeName = XMLString::transcode(attribute.c_str());
00115     bool attributeFound = false;
00116 
00117     DOMDocument* doc = parser->getDocument();
00118     DOMNodeList* root = doc->getElementsByTagName(algorithmName);
00119     if (root->getLength() > 1) {
00120         LOG(WARNING) << "More than one " << algorithm << " found, taking the first one";
00121     } else if(root->getLength() < 1) {
00122         LOG(WARNING) << "No algorithm called " << algorithm << " found.";
00123                 return false;
00124     }
00125 
00126     current = root->item(0);
00127     DOMNamedNodeMap* attributesList =  current->getAttributes();
00128     attributeNode = attributesList->getNamedItem(attributeName);
00129 
00130     if (attributeNode != 0) {
00131         *result = XMLString::transcode(attributeNode->getNodeValue());
00132         attributeFound = true;
00133     }
00134 
00135     XMLString::release(&algorithmName);
00136     XMLString::release(&attributeName);
00137 
00138     return attributeFound;
00139 #else
00140     return false;
00141 #endif
00142 }

00148 bool ConfigurationFileHandler::getAttribute(std::string algorithm, std::string attribute, double* result) {
00149 #ifdef BRICS_XERCES_ENABLE
00150         if (errorsOccured) {
00151                 return false;
00152         }
00153 
00154     DOMNode* current = NULL;
00155     DOMNode* attributeNode = NULL;
00156     XMLCh* algorithmName = XMLString::transcode(algorithm.c_str());
00157     XMLCh* attributeName = XMLString::transcode(attribute.c_str());
00158     string tmpResult;
00159     bool attributeFound = false;
00160 
00161     DOMDocument* doc = parser->getDocument();
00162     DOMNodeList* root = doc->getElementsByTagName(algorithmName);
00163     if (root->getLength() > 1) {
00164         LOG(WARNING) << "More than one " << algorithm << " found, taking the first one";
00165     } else if(root->getLength() < 1) {
00166         LOG(WARNING) << "No algorithm called " << algorithm << " found.";
00167                 return false; //TODO release resources
00168     }
00169 
00170     current = root->item(0);
00171     DOMNamedNodeMap* attributesList =  current->getAttributes();
00172     attributeNode = attributesList->getNamedItem(attributeName);
00173 
00174     if (attributeNode != 0) {
00175         tmpResult = XMLString::transcode(attributeNode->getNodeValue());
00176         *result = atof(tmpResult.c_str());
00177         attributeFound = true;
00178     }
00179 
00180     XMLString::release(&algorithmName);
00181     XMLString::release(&attributeName);
00182 
00183     return attributeFound;
00184 #else
00185     return false;
00186 #endif
00187 }

00189 bool ConfigurationFileHandler::getAttribute(std::string algorithm, std::string attribute, int* result) {
00190 #ifdef BRICS_XERCES_ENABLE
00191         if (errorsOccured) {
00192                 return false;
00193         }
00194 
00195     DOMNode* current = NULL;
00196     DOMNode* attributeNode = NULL;
00197     XMLCh* algorithmName = XMLString::transcode(algorithm.c_str());
00198     XMLCh* attributeName = XMLString::transcode(attribute.c_str());
00199     string tmpResult;
00200     bool attributeFound = false;
00201 
00202     DOMDocument* doc = parser->getDocument();
00203     DOMNodeList* root = doc->getElementsByTagName(algorithmName);
00204     if (root->getLength() > 1) {
00205         LOG(WARNING) << "More than one " << algorithm << " found, taking the first one";
00206     } else if(root->getLength() < 1) {
00207         LOG(WARNING) << "No algorithm called " << algorithm << " found.";
00208                 return false; //TODO release resouces
00209     }
00210 
00211     current = root->item(0);
00212     DOMNamedNodeMap* attributesList =  current->getAttributes();
00213     attributeNode = attributesList->getNamedItem(attributeName);
00214 
00215     if (attributeNode != 0) {
00216                     tmpResult = XMLString::transcode(attributeNode->getNodeValue());
00217                     *result = atoi(tmpResult.c_str());
00218                     attributeFound = true;
00219         }
00220 
00221     XMLString::release(&algorithmName);
00222     XMLString::release(&attributeName);
00223 
00224     return attributeFound;
00225 #else
00226     return false;
00227 #endif
00228 }

00230 bool ConfigurationFileHandler::getSubAlgorithm(std::string algorithm, std::string subalgorithm, std::string* result){
00231 #ifdef BRICS_XERCES_ENABLE
00232         if (errorsOccured) {
00233                 return false;
00234         }
00235 
00236     DOMNode* current = NULL;
00237     DOMNode* attributeNode = NULL;
00238     XMLCh* algorithmName = XMLString::transcode(algorithm.c_str());
00239     XMLCh* subAlgorithmName = XMLString::transcode(subalgorithm.c_str());
00240     XMLCh* implementationString = XMLString::transcode("implementation");
00241     bool subAlgorithmFound = false;
00242 
00243     DOMDocument* doc = parser->getDocument();
00244     DOMNodeList* root = doc->getElementsByTagName(algorithmName);
00245     if (root->getLength() > 1) {
00246         LOG(WARNING) << "More than one " << algorithm << " found, taking the first one";
00247     } else if(root->getLength() < 1) {
00248         LOG(WARNING) << "No algorithm called " << algorithm << " found.";
00249                 return false; //TODO release resouces
00250     }
00251 
00252     current = root->item(0);
00253 
00254     //search in children notes
00255         for (current = current->getFirstChild()->getNextSibling(); current!=NULL; current = current->getNextSibling()) {
00256                 string nodeName = XMLString::transcode(current->getNodeName());
00257                 if (nodeName.compare(subalgorithm) == 0) {
00258                     DOMNamedNodeMap* attributesList =  current->getAttributes();
00259                     attributeNode = attributesList->getNamedItem(implementationString);
00260                     if (attributeNode != 0) {
00261                         *result = XMLString::transcode(attributeNode->getNodeValue());
00262                         subAlgorithmFound = true;
00263                         break; //take only first found
00264                     }
00265                 }
00266         }
00267 
00268     XMLString::release(&algorithmName);
00269     XMLString::release(&subAlgorithmName);
00270     XMLString::release(&implementationString);
00271 
00272     return subAlgorithmFound;
00273 #else
00274     return false;
00275 #endif
00276 }
00277 
00278 bool ConfigurationFileHandler::getErrorsOccured() {
00279         return errorsOccured;
00280 }
